languages.text: {n}Спустя полчаса вы протягиваете девушке книгу, исписанную вашими комментариями поверх текста. Она принимает ее с благоговением.{/n}
{n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя полчаса вы протягиваете девушке книгу, исписанную вашими комментариями поверх текста. Она принимает ее с благоговением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevra her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

{n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}
{n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine halbe Stunde später gibst du Jinevri ihr Buch zurück, das nun mit zahlreichen Kommentaren zwischen den Zeilen versehen ist. Sie nimmt es ehrfürchtig entgegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine halbe Stunde später gibst du Jinevri ihr Buch zurück, das nun mit zahlreichen Kommentaren zwischen den Zeilen versehen ist. Sie nimmt es ehrfürchtig entgegen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une demi-heure plus tard, vous rendez un tome annoté de toute part à Jinevri. Elle l'accepte avec révérence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une demi-heure plus tard, vous rendez un tome annoté de toute part à Jinevri. Elle l'accepte avec révérence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Media hora después, devuelves a Jinevri el libro, lleno de anotaciones entre las líneas. Lo acepta con sumo respeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Media hora después, devuelves a Jinevri el libro, lleno de anotaciones entre las líneas. Lo acepta con sumo respeto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}30分後、行間に数多の注釈が書かれた状態の書物をジネヴリに返す。彼女はそれを、恭しく受け取った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}30分後、行間に数多の注釈が書かれた状態の書物をジネヴリに返す。彼女はそれを、恭しく受け取った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}半个小时之后，你把杰尼娃的书还给了他，里面多出了许多夹杂在字里行间的评论。杰尼娃满怀虔诚地接过了这本书。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}半个小时之后，你把杰尼娃的书还给了他，里面多出了许多夹杂在字里行间的评论。杰尼娃满怀虔诚地接过了这本书。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yarım saat sonra Jinevri'ye kitabını geri veriyorsun. Kitapta artık satırların arasına yazılmış sayısız yorum var. Jinevri, kitabı hürmetle geri alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hand Jinevri her tome back, which now contains numerous comments written between the lines. She accepts it reverently.{/n}
